text: If the Commissioner approves the application of an applicant to be a merchant bank, the Commissioner shall issue to the applicant a charter stating that the applicant is authorized to conduct business as a merchant bank under this chapter.

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Application and Certification as a Merchant Bank.
